title: The Thom Hartmann Show - June 16, 2008 (24kbs Audio).mp3
description:
Quote of the Day: The future is here. It&#039;s just not widely distributed yet  -  William Gibson

Hour One  -  Dozens Of Men -- Perhaps Hundreds -- Wrongfully Imprisoned By U.S.

Hour Two  -  Carrie Lukas www.iwf.org  Topic: Will deregulating the health care industry turn it into the wild, wild west?

Hour Three  - Rick Perlstein  www.rickperlstein.org   Topic: In his book Nixonland, Perlstein argues that Nixon was the "grandfather of today&#039;s politics of hate"

Guest: "Labor Segment" Tim Newman www.laborrights.org   Topic: Campaign against Bridgestone/ Firestone to end child labor practices
